summary: This module implements a Graph Isomorphism Network (GIN) with an MLP aggregation layer, along with helper utilities for dataset partitioning, model evaluation, and a training loop that leverages DGL and PyTorch to perform graph classification on benchmark datasets.
business_intent: Demonstrate how to build, train, and assess a GIN model for graph classification tasks, showcasing end‑to‑end workflow including data loading, k‑fold cross‑validation, and optimization using deep learning frameworks.
